ARABIC: وَلَمَّا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلْحَقُّ قَالُوا۟ هَٰذَا سِحْرٌ وَإِنَّا بِهِۦ كَٰفِرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: But when the truth came to them they said, 'This is magic and we reject it.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Yet when the truth had come to them, they said: "This is sorcery. We shall never believe in it."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And when the Truth came to them they said: “This is just sorcery and we reject it.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: When the truth came to them, they said, "This is magic and we have no faith in it".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And when the truth came to them they said, “This is magic, and we disbelieve in it.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And when the truth came to them, they said: "This is magic, and we disbelieve therein."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And when there came to them the truth they said: This is magic, and surely we are disbelievers in it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And when the truth came to them, they said, 'This is a sorcery, and in it we are unbelievers.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And now that the Truth hath come unto them they say: This is mere magic, and lo! we are disbelievers therein.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: but when the truth came to them, they said, "This is sorcery, and we reject it."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And when the truth cometh Unto them, they say this is magic, and verily we are therein disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: But when the truth came to them, they said, ‘This is magic, and we indeed disbelieve in it.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But when the Truth came to them, they said: "This is sorcery, and we do reject it."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And when the truth (this Quran) came to them, they (the disbelievers in this Quran) said: "This is magic, and we disbelieve therein."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But when the truth came to them, they said: 'This is sorcery, we disbelieve in it'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But when the truth came to them, they said, “This is sorcery, and we refuse to believe in it.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But when the truth came to them, they said, "This is magic, and indeed we are, concerning it, disbelievers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [43:30] But when the truth, the Qur’ān, came to them, they said, ‘This is sorcery, and we are indeed disbelievers in it’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And now that the Truth) the Scripture and Messenger (hath come unto them they say: This) i.e. this Scripture (is mere magic) is a mere lie, (and lo! we are disbelievers therein) in Muhammad (pbuh) and the Qur'an.
